Le paquet R [`gganimate`](https://gganimate.com/) permet de mettre *visuellement* en avant des relations particulières entre les données.  

## Chargement des paquets R utiles

```{r}
#| label: load-ggplot
library(ggplot2)
library(gganimate)
library(gifski)
```

## Exemple d'animation

```{r}
#| label: geombar-animate
ggplot(mpg) +
  geom_bar(aes(x = factor(cyl))) +
  labs(title = 'Number of cars in {closest_state} by number of cylinders') +
  transition_states(states = year) +
  enter_grow() +
 exit_fade()
```
